metadata.title: Azure DevOps Engineer AZ-400 Practice Questions

3.name: Design and Implement Build and Release Pipelines

4.name: Develop a Security and Compliance Plan

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Configure Processes and Communications (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Dashboards is a key concept in Configure Processes and Communications. This domain covers topics essential for the Azure DevOps Engineer exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with configure collaboration and communication. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any configure processes and communications task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Configure Processes and Communications is most closely related to implement agile planning and portfolio management?
options: Configure Processes and Communications governance and oversight
Configure Processes and Communications implementation and operations
Configure Processes and Communications assessment and testing
Configure Processes and Communications risk management
questions.explanation: Implement agile planning and portfolio management falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Configure Processes and Communications.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Configure Processes and Communications (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Stakeholder Feedback is a key concept in Configure Processes and Communications. This domain covers topics essential for the Azure DevOps Engineer exam.
